law.catch_line: In its sole discretion, the Authority may set:...

text.section:
In its sole discretion, the Authority may set:
the premiums and fees for providing bonding assistance under the Program; and
the terms and conditions when the premiums and fees are payable.
The premiums and fees may vary in amount among transactions and at different stages of a transaction.
A determination by the Authority on premiums and fees remains effective for as long as the bonding assistance provided by the Authority is in effect.
